title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Culturally Grounded Social Studies Learning Model for Scientific Values Cultivation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational social science concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the connection to social value by analyzing science cases that reflect local community culture
Learners can design culture-based action research in mobile environments and apply three or more scientific problem-solving methods
Learners can document changes in their science value perception in a reflective journal with over 80% participation based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
